column1:
Overall, the positive sentiment percentages have improved over the years for Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services, and General. Cleaniness saw the largest increase of 56.08% in 2017 to 68.00% in 2019. Amenities also saw a significant increase from 50.32% in 2018 to 57.52% in 2023. Location saw an increase from 36.17% in 2020 to 55.33% in 2023. Services saw a slight increase from 41.97% in 2022 to 48.26% in 2023. General saw an increase from 45.03% in 2021 to 46.43% in 2023.

In order to improve the overall positive sentiment percentages for each aspect, Cleaniness should focus on providing customers with the highest hygiene standards possible. Amenities should ensure that all facilities are of the highest quality and regularly maintained. Location should make sure that the premises are easily accessible for customers. Services should focus on providing customers with attentive and respectful customer service. Finally, General should focus on maintaining a positive atmosphere in the premises for customers.
